ygData.subject: Re: Darkwood sheild
ygData.msgSnippet: It is found in High Hold Pass on a Named Gnoll (Vexven Mucktail) not the Polished Granite Tomahawk also Spawns in this area on a Gnoll Named Grenix Mucktail
ygData.messageBody:
It is found in High Hold Pass on a Named Gnoll (Vexven Mucktail) not the
Polished Granite Tomahawk also Spawns in this area on a Gnoll Named Grenix
Mucktail but are Rare and Over camped (ok ok im guilty for having done it in
the past but have long stopped) at lvl 20 it was still a hard solo Battle
for a well equiped paladin (Vexven not as bad but Grenix and that Damn tommy
of his...) Im not sure how the spawn works some say you get one or the other
at random and one every 3 hours BUT i was there one day fro like 8 hours abd
only saw one Vexven and not grenix UNTILL i tried to Log kind of funny but
grenix spawned on me and we fought for 10 minute each having a tommy that
kept going off finally i killed him and i tried to log as i was resting and
lo and behold Vexven spawned on me again but i killed him with a little help
pretty quick...

>Subject: [EQCheats] Darkwood sheild

>I would like to know which mob drops this shield. And how rare it is.
